definition: a facility where something is available, specify the origin of
details:
noun
- a facility where something is available
- anything that provides inspiration for later work
= synonyms: germ
- a document (or organization) from which information is obtained
= example: a document (or organization) from which information is obtained
- a publication (or a passage from a publication) that is referred to
= synonyms: reference
- the place where something begins, where it springs into being
= synonyms: beginning
- anything (a person or animal or plant or substance) in which an infectious agent normally lives and multiplies
= synonyms: reservoir
- someone who originates or causes or initiates something
= synonyms: generator
- a person who supplies information
= synonyms: informant
- (technology) a process by which energy or a substance enters a system
= example: (technology) a process by which energy or a substance enters a system
verb
- specify the origin of
= example: specify the origin of
- get a product from another country or business
= example: get a product from another country or business
